game2dai.maths

Class Vector2D

  • java.lang.Object
    • game2dai.maths.Vector2D
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class Vector2D
extends Object
implements Serializable
    This 2D vector class uses the double data type throughout.
    See Also:

        public static boolean isSecondInFOVofFirstXXX(Vector2D posFirst,
                              Vector2D facingFirst,
                              double fovFirst,
                              Vector2D posSecond)
        Determines whether entity 2 is visible from entity 1.
        Parameters:
        posFirst - position of first entity
        facingFirst - direction first entity is facing
        fovFirst - field of view (radians)
        posSecond - position of second entity
        Returns:
        true if second entity is inside 'visible' to the first entity
